title: Battlestar Galactica Extras Grace Park Edit v2
description:
Battlestar Galactica Extras Grace Park Edit v2
6-parts - 17minutes 37seconds - 150MB
1080p-720p/480p 3000Mbps/700Kbps AVC - 2.0 160Kbps AAC
2-Pass Encoding (Turbo first pass) Preset = 09 (very slow)
Blu-Ray source

VERSION2 CHANGES: only 150MB vs v1's 286MB and black bars around some 480p video were removed

These videos are a fanedit of all of the Grace Park clips from the Battlestar Galactica Blu-Ray box set extras covering all 4 seasons and the movies Razor and The Plan. There are 6 files to account for the different resolutions and aspect ratios. The audio was usually decreased if the clip showed Grace with other people talking, e.g. a cameraman talking technical issues with Grace in the video.

If you like Boomer, Athena, Eights or are simply a Grace Park fan, you'll like this. No more waiting for Grace to pop up while watching the extras! :)

Battlestar.Galactica.Extras.Grace.Park.Edit.v2.part1.720p-1080p.mkv
Battlestar.Galactica.Extras.Grace.Park.Edit.v2.part2.480p.mkv
